001/** This controller provides functionality for viewing inventory by displaying all ingredients dynamically
002 * @author Aarya Patel
003 */
004package src.controller;
005
006import src.controller.useful_functions.user_role;
007import src.model.ingredient;
008
009import static src.controller.useful_functions.current_user_role;
010import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
011
012import java.util.List;
013
014import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
015import javafx.fxml.FXML;
016import javafx.scene.control.Button;
017import javafx.scene.layout.VBox;
018
019import src.data.ingredientsData;
020
021public class view_inventory_controller {
022    /**
023     * This function handles the back click action to return to the inventory page
024     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
025     */
026    @FXML
027    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
028        switch_scene("GUI/inventory_page.fxml", event);
029    }
030
031    /**
032     * This function handles the view inventory click action to navigate to the view inventory page
033     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
034     */
035    @FXML
036    private void handle_view_inventory(ActionEvent event) {
037        switch_scene("GUI/view_inventory.fxml", event);
038    }
039
040    /**
041     * This function handles the update inventory click action to navigate to the update inventory page
042     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
043     */
044    @FXML
045    private void handle_update_inventory(ActionEvent event) {
046        switch_scene("GUI/update_employee.fxml", event);
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * This function handles the add inventory click action to navigate to the add inventory page
051     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
052     */
053    @FXML
054    private void handle_add_inventory(ActionEvent event) {
055        switch_scene("GUI/add_inventory.fxml", event);
056    }
057
058    /** Container for dynamically generated ingredient buttons */
059    @FXML private VBox ingredients_container;
060
061    /**
062     * Initializes the view inventory page by dynamically creating buttons for all ingredients
063     */
064    @FXML
065    public void initialize() {
066
067        //Topping Button Insertion and Handler
068        List<ingredient> ingredients = ingredientsData.getIngredients();
069        for (ingredient ingredient : ingredients) {
070            Button btn = new Button(ingredient.getIngredientName());
071            btn.setMaxWidth(Double.MAX_VALUE);
072            ingredients_container.getChildren().add(btn);
073        }
074    }
075}
